summary: This document appears to be a daily assignment log for a corrections officer or staff member at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, covering dates in July and August 2019. It details shift assignments, days off, and unit postings (e.g., 7 SOUTH, 11 SOUTH, SHU) during the third quarter of 2019, which coincides with Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration there.
locations: MCC NEW YORK NEW YORK, NY
Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is a daily assignment log for MCC New York staff for the 3rd quarter of 2019, specifically covering July and August.
Assignments include posts in units like 7 SOUTH, 11 SOUTH, 9 NORTH, and Special Housing Units (SHU #1, SHU #2, SHU #4).
The log shows staff were assigned to 'DRY CELL' and 'OTMNV' (likely overtime or special watch) posts, which may relate to high-profile inmate monitoring.
The timeframe covered (July-August 2019) is when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated at MCC New York prior to his death on August 10, 2019.
No specific individuals are named in this log; it appears to be an administrative record of staff postings and schedules.
